# rirs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rirs is to access IRS data that is publically available

## Installation

You can install the released version of rirs from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("rirs")
```
